column4: I want to download Ubuntu with KDE. If I go here: http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu there is a link that says "Download now - Download the Ubuntu, Edubuntu or Kubuntu CD installer to your computer now." but when I click it - there is only one download, and it says nothing about KDE/Kubuntu. Where do I find it? Or is there only one CD now?
but you don't understand. I clicked the link that says "download
but you don't understand. I clicked the link that says "download Kubuntu . . . and then on the next page there's no option for Kubuntu"
